column1: Enabling this feature will disable partial cache invalidation. Full varnish cache flush will be executed instead, according to the cron expression configured below.

column1: Magento is configured to use the built-in Full Page Cache. To use Webscale varnish caching please change "Caching Application" to "Varnish Cache" under the "Full Page Cache" tab in System Configuration
column2: Magento is configured to use the built-in Full Page Cache. To use Webscale varnish caching please change "Caching Application" to "Varnish Cache" under the "Full Page Cache" tab in System Configuration

column1: Please configure API Token and Application Id.
column2: Please configure API Token and Application Id.

column1: To be able to use Webscale varnish cache please configure "Application Id".

column1: There is error occurred while trying to purge varnish cache. Please refer to logs for more information.
